title: PCR Prep into 384 plate
author: Opentrons
description: PCR Prep: samples in 96-well plate, reactions in 384-well plate
process:
Dispense 9uL of master mix from tube A1 to all wells, in column A and B (384 well plate, same tip).
Dispense 9uL of master mix from tube A2 to all wells, in column C and D (384 well plate, same tip).
Dilute samples 1:1 with H2O to 40uL total. Mix. Different tip per sample. Samples in tubes C1, C2 etc.
Dispense 1-2uL each sample to 3 wells (same tip) on 384 well plate, per row (A,B,C,D and so forth). Mix.

markdown.title: PCR Prep into 384 plate
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: PCR Prep: samples in 96-well plate, reactions in 384-well plate
markdown.process:
1. Dispense 9uL of master mix from tube A1 to all wells, in column A and B (384 well plate, same tip).
2. Dispense 9uL of master mix from tube A2 to all wells, in column C and D (384 well plate, same tip).
3. Dilute samples 1:1 with H2O to 40uL total. Mix. Different tip per sample. Samples in tubes C1, C2 etc.
4. Dispense 1-2uL each sample to 3 wells (same tip) on 384 well plate, per row (A,B,C,D and so forth). Mix.
